body: hi I miss my friend Hes go's to my school and we really enjoy playing togather but hes banned D: hes name is angomango21 2 days after he became Emerald rank he got banned which was a really big upset for me :(

title: please unban my friend

replies.body:
Hello,
Please do not post ban appeals on the forums. Please get your friend to email support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged:
Hello,
Please do not post ban appeals on the forums. Please get your friend to email support@avicus.net.

replies.body: can u please unban him, Im online now But he cant come on and play with me.
replies.body_tagged: can u please unban him, Im online now But he cant come on and play with me.

replies.body:
There are then two possibilities...
1) His appeal was denied.
2) His email was lost with the other hundred emails support gets.

replies.body: can u please just unban him I wanna play with him he spent so much money to get his rank but now he cant play
replies.body_tagged: can u please just unban him I wanna play with him he spent so much money to get his rank but now he cant play

replies.body: Our Appeals can get denied...aww seems like I'm never coming back on.
replies.body_tagged: Our Appeals can get denied...aww seems like I'm never coming back on.

replies.body:
If your friend didn't break the rules in the first place, this wouldn't have happened. 
Also, donators are not exempt from the rules, therefore they are punished the same way as non-donors would.
Locking...
